Author: 101_honey
Text: not to be super creepy but does your uni start with an R and is in canada, because if yes i likely attend the same school!!! and i can say that, if the school is what i think it is, we should just feel happy they even closed it down at all. theyre notorious for not shutting down like ever.  also if u go to that school the extreme weather warnings are more for the homeless/people who work with the homeless to help try and get them into a shelter because its deadly weather for them!

Author: lorabore
Text: My university was closed today due to massive snow storm. But they posted it to Facebook at 630 AM and that was followed up by emails from all professors by 8 am. I would be so pissed to have gotten to school first.
